pr_title: change JSONObject type and rename "event" to "events"

timeline.bodyText: Lets add a constant for this
timeline.author: mefarazath

timeline.bodyText: @piraveena was the previous behaviour wrong according the spec?
timeline.author: mefarazath

replies.bodyText: previously we had it as event. But spec says it should be events
replies.author: piraveena

timeline.author: piraveena

timeline.message: Change JSONObject type, Rename "event" claim to "events"
Change JSONObject type, Rename "event" claim to "events"

timeline.bodyText: Won't we need this same constant during logout token validation?
timeline.author: mefarazath

replies.bodyText: we need. But it should go in the outbound component.
